name: LocalTripper
tag_list: local-trips, local-travel, local-events, local-festivals, southern-california, weekend-getaways, trip-ideas
overview:
LocalTripper is a localâ€™s guide to original weekend getaways, activities, and events.

All content is submitted and reviewed by local users who are in the know. LocalTripper organizes all content according to trip themes to help you conveniently plan your getaway. For example, some hotels are great for romantic getaways while others are more suited for a night on the town.

User-based: The site revolves around user-generated content so that any member or event promoter can contribute his or her ideas.

Connected: LocalTripper is fully integrated with Facebook Connect, enabling users to share trips and events with their friends and families.

Relevant: Everything you see is within driving distance from your home.
